theme_description: A clean, minimalist theme which puts the focus on the blog content
blog_header_description: This will be displayed in the header of every page
blog_header_description_description: A short description for your blog
menu_items_description: Each URL you add will be displayed in the menu on every page
menu_item_url_description: A relative or absolute SAFE network URL
menu_item_text_description: The text to display within the URL
